Name: Lost Roads
About the game: NORMAL MODE: Escape the rooms until departure, pay attention to the notes. CHALLENGE MODE: Escape the house before the end of time, for this you must use the objects that are in the house. This is our first project of many that we have prepared from our indie development team. For us it is a pleasure to work with the Steam platform and with the Unreal Engine 4 graphics engine, if you enjoy our games, we invite you to stay tuned for the next projects that we are going to bring.
